description: Type-level $subsumes GET: A subsumes B (Clinical finding > Fracture of femur)
Type-level $subsumes GET: equivalent codes (same SNOMED code)
Type-level $subsumes GET: subsumed-by (B subsumes A)
Type-level $subsumes GET: not-subsumed (Fracture vs MI, unrelated)
Type-level $subsumes GET: Disease subsumes Diabetes mellitus
Type-level $subsumes GET with explicit SNOMED version parameter
Type-level $subsumes GET with LOINC codes (Systolic BP vs BP panel)

Type-level $subsumes GET: error - no parameters at all
Type-level $subsumes GET: error - unknown code system

Instance-level $subsumes POST: codeA/codeB on complete CodeSystem (no system param needed)
